name: Take And Trap
description:
Take and Trap, a classic running and collecting game but with a small twist,

You play as a Kaola, this fellow whos hungry and eating all the apples scattered around the forest, while getting chased by foxes. You lure them into traps and eat and eat and eat, your goal is to find a golden apple, can you find it?, it can be challenging.

This game is originally based on a childhood favorite game that I played on my mom's mobile phone. Its a old 2d runner game, I finally decided to create my own one with a nice 3D Low Poly Environment. 

Hope you enjoy it!

Note : for anyone who might be hurt to bright or bloom effects, this game is set in a bright environment as you see in the screenshots. My little bro has this problem where he get headaches when he sees bright lights, noting it down here and also read the "Gameboard.txt" for infos.

Note: the screenshots if you view them you might find them being too blurry or with bloom. In game its not like that. Its because of the software I used to take the screenshots.

P.S: Leave a comment about your experience ^_^, so I can Improve myself.
